# Third party libraries

## Catch2
- URL: https://github.com/catchorg/Catch2
- Version: v2.5.0 (tag)
- License: BSL-1.0

## spdlog
- URL: https://github.com/gabime/spdlog
- Version: v1.2.1 (tag)
- License: MIT

Included files are the include directory and the LICENSE file. Uses a custom
CMakeLists.txt file.
